ygData.subject: Re: Obsessive compulsive behavior begins.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine kept a straight face as Ice sent her message to him. He looked her in the eyes, With our reputation in combat I m sure we ll be saving each others

Lunarpine kept a straight face as Ice sent her message to him. He 
looked her in the eyes, "With our reputation in combat I'm sure we'll 
be saving each others hides more often.

Foxfingers shook her hand. "It's a pleasure." he said, still in a bit 
of a shock from being moved. His thoughts were as quick as his escape 
routs as one thought told him "Leave me alone wench" and then "I love 
a dominant creature." 

Foxfingers quickly sidestepped her making an excuse as he 
did. "Excuse me Ice, I must go um, help Veratis with the DNA." He 
scampered off toward the lab thinking "Who's that mutant beast think 
she is picking me up like that. Although I'll be sure she's around 
next time I need a lockpick."

Lunarpine transformed to bot mode and stepped forward. "Good to have 
you back." His thoughts told his true feelings "I've missed you, I 
was afraid for what I'd gotten you into."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She smiled at him. She could tell he wasn't in a good mood. But she 
> couldn't help but chuckle alittle. "You need to wake up on the 
right 
> side of the CR tank a little more often." She walked out of the lab 
> and went wandering around the ship. She transformed into her knew 
bot 
> mode and went looking for Lunarpine. She sensed his thoughts and 
went 
> through the ship looking for him. She found him and FoxFingers 
> together. She smiled,"Hello all. I finally got things worked out." 
> She picked up FoxFingers with her Telekenesis and floated him over 
to 
> her. She smiled and shook his hand. "Hello there. I'm Ice. Pleased 
to 
> meet you." She set him down and looked over at Lunarpine. "How are 
> you feeling. I wanted to thank you for saving my life, again." she 
> smiled and chuckled slightly. "You know, you have this habit of 
> saving my hide. I hope that oneday, I can return the favor." She 
> projected this thought into his head,"My love." so FoxFingers 
> couldn't hear it.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Veratis awoke in a start."Ice, please don't do that to me while 
I'm
> > sleeping." He lay back again but couldn't fall back to 
> sleep. "Alright you
> > win, I'm on my way." His chamber opened up and he stepped out. He 
> wasn't
> > fully functional yet. he was beginning to wonder if giving her 
this 
> body was
> > a mistake. She was the bear but it was him that was fealing 
grumpy 
> at the
> > moment. He stepped to the replicator and created a reboost 
compound 
> (Roboyic
> > coffee) he sucked it down and proceeded to the lab. He stepped in 
> and saw
> > the mess that the drones had created. "Should I even bother to 
ask 
> what went
> > on in here?" He saw the two drones on the floor. "Never mind, I 
> don't want
> > to know." He proceeded to the computer to see what the scans for 
> the night
> > had read. "It seems you had a strong ECG reading for the night." 
> Again the
> > old science bot checked the mess in the room. "Which would 
explain 
> this
> > mess." He checked all the readings multiple times to be sure of 
the 
> results.
> > "It seems the virus is out of your system, you're free to go 
outside
> > whenever you like. "Preferably ASAP." his thoughts weren't easy 
to 
> hide as
> > he started programming the other drones to clean up the mess.
> > 
> > After his job was complete he decided that since he was already 
> awake he'd
> > check the DNA that foxfingers hsd brought back. he had a grizzly 
> bear, a
> > wolf, and an extremely powerful raptor. those deffinitely had
> > possabilities.The Dragon cells were an odd addition and (Whatever 
> Tavatron
> > turned into) could be set aside for now. He decided to start with 
> the
> > raptor. he programmed another protoform and began the procedure. 
He 
> tried to
> > deprogram the parts of the DNA that were Transmetal2 technology. 
As 
> an
> > experiment he injected the virus once again. If Primes prophecy 
was 
> to
> > become a reality he'd need to make creatures to fit the 
> description. "All
> > would become one" and Translife and organics would join.
